summary: Phase 1 completed: EvalBMCS truth definitions added. Phase 2 blocked: EvalBMCS lacks full modal coherence needed for truth lemma. The axiom cannot be removed using this approach.

artifacts.summary: Implementation summary documenting the blocking issue and alternative approaches

partial_progress.blocking_reason: EvalBMCS lacks full modal coherence. The truth lemma box case requires membership<->truth at ALL families, but EvalBMCS only has modal coherence at eval_family. The original BMCS approach with the axiom remains necessary until EvalBMCS is strengthened to have full modal coherence or an alternative proof path is developed.

completion_data.completion_summary: Added EvalBMCS truth definitions to BMCSTruth.lean and TruthLemma.lean. Phase 2 blocked because EvalBMCS structure lacks full modal coherence needed for the truth lemma - it only has modal coherence at eval_family, not at all families as required for the box case. The singleFamily_modal_backward_axiom cannot be removed using this approach.
